DOC.brief_summary: Chemotherapy drug use different way stop cancer cell divide stop grow die . Zosuquidar may help Gemtuzumab Ozogamicin ( GO ) kill cancer cell make cancer cell sensitive drug . It know whether Gemtuzumab Ozogamicin ( GO ) effective without zosuquidar treat acute myeloid leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Gemtuzumab Ozogamicin ( GO ) Combination With Zosuquidar Patients With CD33 Positive Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : Phase I : Determine optimal dose schedule GO zosuquidar use combination . Phase II : Determine complete remission rate ( CR+CRp )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Morphologic evidence acute myeloid leukemia first relapse . 2 . Phase I : 18 year old , Phase II : 50 year old 1 . Prior treatment zosuquidar 2 . Any investigational agent within 1 month enrollment lack recovery toxicity secondary agent 3 . History stem cell transplant
